page.title: 14 MICHELIN
page.content: The Michelin factory was built and opened in 1970/71.The size of the factory is 30 acres but the size of the whole site is 95 acres. Michelin are always making changes to their factory.Michelin is a French company which make a wide variety of tyres.There are 1100 employees and they work 5.5 days a week,3 or 4 shifts and they work continuosly.They look after their workers well by giving good apprenticeships,providing a social club and sports facilities and fair pay.However the workers are not always satisfied with their pay, but they did agree this year to keep their pay the same in order to save their jobs.
